fallingChars Class Reference

this class creates the falling characters of type - fruit, insects, and stones the class associates the id, points, type with each object More...

#include <fallingChars.h>

Detailed Description

this class creates the falling characters of type - fruit, insects, and stones the class associates the id, points, type with each object

00053     ngl::Random *rand=ngl::Random::instance();

00055     {
00056         //generating random position for the characters
00057         FallingChars_arr[f]=rand->getRandomVec3();
00058         FallingChars_arr[f].m_x=FallingChars_arr[f].m_x*10.0f*3.0f;
00059         FallingChars_arr[f].m_y = 30.0f;
00060         FallingChars_arr[f].m_z=FallingChars_arr[f].m_z*23.0f;
00061         m_id[f]=f;
00062         collectedFlag[f] = false;
